configuration.name: widget_07555911055570039
configuration.stem: This fossil is about 50 million years old. What might this fossil provide evidence for? Select all that apply.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Think about the types of information that can be interpreted from fossils.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: The fossil provides evidence that flowering plants existed 50 million years ago and it provides evidence of similarities and differences in structure between modern plants. The anatomical similarities provide evidence that the fossil is an ancestor of sunflowers and other similar flowering plants.
